text: Futhi nguMvelinqangi owaninika indawo yokuhlala ezindlini zenu futhi wanenzela ngezikhumba zezinkomo izindlu zalula (ukuzithwala) mhla nihamba nangamhla nihlala (lapho nifudukele khona) kanye nangovolo noboya bemvu nangoboya (bamakameli nezimbuzi) ukuze kuhlobiseke bahlale kahle okwesikhashana
